qas.question: On what date was the Treaty on the Creation of the USSR passed?
What body passed the Treaty on the Creation of the USSR?

answers.text: First Congress of the Soviets of the USSR

qas.question: Along with the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic and Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic, what state joined Russia to form the Soviet Union?
On what date was the 1924 Soviet Constitution adopted?
What body adopted the 1924 Soviet Constitution?

answers.text: the Second Congress of Soviets of the USSR

qas.question: On what date was the Treaty on the Creation of the USSR rejected?

plausible_answers.text: First Congress of the Soviets of the USSR

qas.question: What body rejected the Treaty on the Creation of the USSR?
Along with the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic and Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic, what state didn't join Russia to form the Soviet Union?
On what date was the 1942 Soviet Constitution adopted?

plausible_answers.text: Second Congress of Soviets of the USSR

qas.question: What body rejected the 1924 Soviet Constitution?

context: On <a0_0><b5_0>December 30, 1922<b5_0/><a0_0/>, the <a1_0><b6_0>First Congress of the Soviets of the USSR<b6_0/><a1_0/> approved the Treaty on the Creation of the USSR, by which Russia was united with the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic, Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic, and <a2_0><b7_0>Transcaucasian Soviet Federal Socialist Republic<b7_0/><a2_0/> into a single federal state, the Soviet Union. Later treaty was included in the 1924 Soviet Constitution,[clarification needed] adopted on <a3_0><b8_0>January 31, 1924<b8_0/><a3_0/> by <a4_0>the <b9_0>Second Congress of Soviets of the USSR<b9_0/><a4_0/>.
